Sentencas: This paper presents results from studies of processes and phenomena associated with the behavior of polar dielectric liquid (water and alcohol) in the non-polar proton conducting dielectric ceramic material yttrium doped barium cerate BaCe0.85Y0.15O3-alpha (BCY15).
Titulo: Comparative studies of polarizable dielectric fluids in yttrium-doped barium cerate by permittivity spectroscopy

Sentencas: The investigation was performed by Permittivity Spectroscopy which is a branch of the Impedance Spectroscopy especially tuned for measurements and analysis of dielectrics permittivity properties.
Titulo: Comparative studies of polarizable dielectric fluids in yttrium-doped barium cerate by permittivity spectroscopy

Sentencas: The measurements were carried out in frequency range 1 MHz down to 0.01 Hz.
Titulo: Comparative studies of polarizable dielectric fluids in yttrium-doped barium cerate by permittivity spectroscopy

Sentencas: A gigantic enhancement of the effective capacitance was observed above a certain level of wetting.
Titulo: Comparative studies of polarizable dielectric fluids in yttrium-doped barium cerate by permittivity spectroscopy

Sentencas: The influence of the water is stronger than that of the alcohol, which is described with difference in their polarization ability.
Titulo: Comparative studies of polarizable dielectric fluids in yttrium-doped barium cerate by permittivity spectroscopy

Sentencas: The results are explained with the formation of absorbed dipole film in the porous ceramic matrix.
Titulo: Comparative studies of polarizable dielectric fluids in yttrium-doped barium cerate by permittivity spectroscopy

Sentencas: This phenomenon finds application in proton conducting solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Comparative studies of polarizable dielectric fluids in yttrium-doped barium cerate by permittivity spectroscopy
